Name: Atlantic IT Solutions
dob:
Atlantic IT Solutions is an ICT Company established in early 2008 GC in Ethiopia.  Our company provides a range of IT solutions to automate and facilitate your company activities. We have highly skilled, specialized and professional team to take care of your projects.

We provide Website Development, Custom Software Development, Website Hosting and Business Email Hosting solutions, to mention some.

The majority of our clients include companies like Logistics, Contractors, Hotels, Manufacturers, Importers, Exporters, Associations, NGOs and other Industries. We are committed to our clientsâ€™ requirements and fulfill their needs in a professional and most economical way. Our ultimate aim is to give full satisfaction to our clients.
